ne: <p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">सयौं थुँगा फूलका हामी, एउटै माला नेपाली</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">सार्वभौम भै फैलिएका, मेची-महाकाली।</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">प्रकृतिका कोटी-कोटी सम्पदाको आंचल</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">वीरहरूका रगतले, स्वतन्त्र र अटल।</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">ज्ञानभूमि, शान्तिभूमि तराई, पहाड, हिमाल</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">अखण्ड यो प्यारो हाम्रो मातृभूमि नेपाल।</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">बहुल जाति, भाषा, धर्म, संस्कृति छन् विशाल</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">अग्रगामी राष्ट्र हाम्रो, जय जय नेपाल।</span></p>
en: <p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Sayau thunga ful ka hami eutai mala Nepali</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Sarwabhaum vayi failiyeka mechi mahakali</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Prakriti ka koti koti sampada ko aachala</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Bir haru ka ragata le swotantra ra aatala</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Gyana bhumi shanti bhumi tarai pahad himala</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Akhanda yo pyaroo hamro matri bhumi Nepal</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Bahul jaati bhasa dharma sanskriti chan bishala</span></p><p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:16px">Aagragami rastra hamro jaya jaya Nepal</span></p>
